channel.title: Yell when player kills boss
channel.description: So i made my own minigame that takes you through 5 stages of npc's and gives you a reward if you kill the last one. (sorta like jad and fire cape) and i'm trying to figure out a way to make it so when a player kills the final boss it yells something like "Playername has just defeated the final boss!" i'm not sure how to do that though. could someone help me out please?

item.title: Yell when player kills boss
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

but how do i make it so it says it when the npc dies?

Read full topic

item.title: Yell when player kills boss
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Search in your commands.
e.g. banning some one will mostly send a global message 'playername has banned…"
you can try using the same

Read full topic
